N

NC - Static variable in class jpiv2.FlexFileChooser
Show only network common data form files.
NORMAL_VORTICITY - Static variable in class jpiv2.PivDataFilter
Calculate vorticity component normal to the measurement plane.
normalize(float) - Method in class jpiv2.PivImg
Normalize the image.
NORMALIZED_MEDIAN_TEST - Static variable in class jpiv2.PivDataFilter
Normalized median test.
normalizedMedianTest(double, double) - Method in class jpiv2.PivData
Mark vectors as invalid using the normalized median test proposed by Jerry Westerweel and Fulvio Scarano (Experiments in Fluids (2005) 39: 1096-1100).
normMedianTestNoiseLevel - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Noise Level of the normalized median test (0.1 is a good starting point).
normMedianTestThreshold - Variable in class jpiv2.Settings
Threshold of the normalized median test (2 is a good starting point).
